string.text: Welcome! I have a few things on offer, interested?
Well look here, you have organised a damn snack Bar. TO bad its so damn close to radioactive heaps of dust.
For some people the Dump is a hard place to reach and I congratulate you on that! It will most likely be forgotten quickly though.
Does it make any sense to you? Not far from here is a Bar that buys loot and sells better weapons. While over here, we have bandits and all sorts of scum with checkpoints that will take your money.

Over there in the Bar people are serious and can easily get angry so I warn you not to make a fuss. While the Dump is a place where the rookies find out if they can handle the zone. Fighting Gangsters HA! this is not real combat. They need a few of us old hands to teach them a few things, but the ones that arnt gonna make it die within a week. Step into an anomaly or become mutant food.
All right I heard enough about the rookies. Where are you from?

I was brought up in the forest. I traveled around Europe working as a cook. The leftover food was given to cats and dogs while the homeless were walking around the streets hungry! While here in the Zone how many dogs and cats starve? Not many, as most rookies become a meal.
Who do I speak with around here concerning weapons and ammo?
You want to talk to Vityok Voron. He is a very mysterious person.
Tell me more about this mysterious person.

Want to know what is comfortable here in the Zone? Ravens. If they have one talent among them its they know where death is most likley to happen and they will fly above waiting for fresh corpses. That is how Vityok got the nickname of Raven, attracted to the death and profits of these rookies in the garbage.
Everything is now clear to me. Thank you for telling me what you know of the Raven.
What is it?
Greetings, this is a nice place, wouldn't you agree?
This place is just right for what I call home.
I've been looking around for you. You aren't an easy person to find, yet here you are.
I'm here to do business and I prefer business to words if you understand me. What keeps me in business? it's my weapon.
Sort of attitude one needs in the Zone
I don't know you and you don't know me so there will be no discounts here on my goods okay?
Let's drop the small talk and get down to business, what do you offer?
Can I ask you a question? ...
Transmute recipes are?
Are you sure? ... This is fairly valuable information ...
Perhaps not.
And how much will this information cost?
I think that 30,000 is quite reasonable ... what do you say?
Too much ... I can do without it, I think.
Good choice ...
I hope so.
What are you interested in? ...
do you have any other recipes??
No, I don't have anything else.
So, it was 30,000 rubles ... Agreed?
That's expensive ...
I've input the data onto your PDA ...
Excellent.
Here's your money ... 30,000 rubles ...
Too expensive for me right now ...
Search deep in your pockets. Usual price is 30,000 ... you want the recipe or not!?
Lost data?
Any more recipes there?
